name: Jordan Fox Dev Portfolio

projects.title: Imgswitch
projects.description: Imgswitch is a free online image conversion tool. It is used to quickly and easily convert images between a range of supported formats like JPG, PNG, WebP, SVG, etc.

projects.title: Calpredict
projects.description: CalPredict is a free online tool offering services such as BMI calculation, Weight Loss Goal Calculation, and Healthy Meal Recommendations

services.title: Frontend development
services.description: I develop fast and responsive frontend web applications using modern javascript frameworks.

services.title: Backend development
services.description: I design and build robust backend systems and APIs using popular languages and frameworks.

services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: I provide full stack development services from concept to deployment using modern technologies.

services.title: AWS/Cloud Services
services.description: I offer support in a range of AWS and cloud services including deployment, infrastructure management, serverless applications and more.

aboutpara: A highly motivated, results driven software developer with proven experience in building projects of various sizes and levels of scale from start to finish, I am dedicated to the craft of engineering, passionate about working in the industry, and focused on  developing meaningful, long lasting business relationships with like minded people.
